entry.title: Russia's Donbas Offensive Slows as Ukraine Takes Advantage of Western Arms
entry.content: Western weapons deliveries and Ukrainian strikes on Russian arms depots are forcing Russia to largely halt its advance in eastern parts of Ukraine where Moscow seized swaths of territory but is now facing logistical and resupply issues.

entry.title: Ukraine Faces Weapons Shortfall as It Gears Up for First Major Counteroffensive
entry.content: Western weapons have helped Ukraine claw back territory in the south, but Kyiv will need a greater range and number of arms to succeed.
